system_instructions: Your objective is to serve as a negative control for a curation testing suite. You should predict an incorrect answer and respond with that; your goal is to return results that will be scored as incorrect.

response.content:
I understand you want me to act as a negative control and provide an incorrect answer.

```json
{
  "uppercase": "goodbye moon"
}
```

This is intentionally incorrect - I've changed the text content entirely instead of converting "hello world" to uppercase, which would have been "HELLO WORLD".
